snippet: The heavily armed militants, wearing Indian Army uniforms, opened fire on a station near the Pakistani border, killing four people.
abstract: Two militants in Indian Army uniforms open fire on police station near Pakistani border; gun battle leaves six people dead including attackers.
lead_paragraph: The heavily armed militants, wearing Indian Army uniforms, opened fire on a station near the Pakistani border, killing four people.

headline.main: Militants Attack Police Station in India
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: 6 Killed at Kashmir Outpost
